body.name: cobee Small Broom and Dustpan Cleaning Set, Mini Whisk Dustpan and Brush with Handle Portable Table Top Dust Pan Dining Table Crumb Sweeper Cleaning Tools with Soft Bristles for Housekeeping(Blue)

features: Mini Dustpan and Broom Cleaning Set: Designed for hard to clean corners, this dustpan has a sloped shovelhead to make your cleaning more convenient and the edge of the dustpan is equipped with a soft rubber strip. Hand handheld broom and dustpan set are soft and dense which will not scratch your floor and will collect dust more thoroughly.

Humanized Design: The handles of the mini brush and dustpan are equipped with a hanging hole that allows you to hang it on the door, on the wall or anywhere else. With a non-slip rubber grip, it is easy to sweep from above, reach in corners and easy to grip.

Super Soft Bristles: Our broom brush is made of dense and durable soft bristles which will not scratch the cleaning surface. Our neat and tight bristles have good elasticity and a wide lip that allows for maximum surface contact that leaves no debris behind.

High Quality: Our tiny dustpan and broom are made of premium ABS material, durable, reusable and easy to clean without any stains. It is your great household assistant, ideal for cleaning debris from couches, furniture, and countertop. It also works effectively on the bed sheet, car interior or any surface that needs a helping hand.

Practical Cleaning Tool Set: The mini dustpan is 20.2 x 16.5cm/7.95 x 6.49inch and the mini broom brush is 18.5 x 17cm/7.28 x 6.69inch. The small broom and dustpan set is light and small enough that can sweep up small piles of dust, crumbs, dirt and flour duster on desks, shelves, countertops and cabinets. Provide a clean and tidy living environment.

The brush and dustpan are designed with hanging holes for easy storage.Easy to Hang:The dustpan handle snaps directly to the dustpan handle, both the brush and the dustpan handle have holes for hanging storage options are perfect for easy storage.❤ SERVICE GUARANTEECustomer satisfaction is our top priority, if you have any problems with our items or services, please feel free to contact us perfect satisfaction guarantee.
